channel.title: Gincy -- Guidance, Navigation & Control on Hamza El-Kebir
channel.description: Recent content in Gincy -- Guidance, Navigation & Control on Hamza El-Kebir

item.description: Introduction to State Space $$ \mathbf{\Sigma}_{\mathrm{CTLTI}} = \begin{cases} \dot{\mathbf{x}}(t) &= \mathbf{A} \mathbf{x}(t) + \mathbf{B} \mathbf{u}(t) \\ \mathbf{y}(t) &= \mathbf{C} \mathbf{x}(t) + \mathbf{D} \mathbf{u}(t) \end{cases} $$ $$ \mathbf{\Sigma}_{\mathrm{DTLTI}} = \begin{cases} \mathbf{x}(k+1) &= \mathbf{\Phi} \mathbf{x}(k) + \mathbf{\Gamma} \mathbf{u}(k) \\ \mathbf{y}(k) &= \mathbf{C} \mathbf{x}(k) + \mathbf{D} \mathbf{u}(k) \end{cases} $$ graph LR Guidance -- Navigation Navigation -- Control Control -- Guidance Navigation -- Guidance Fig. 1: Basic flowdown of GN&C
